coreAttributes.authorTag: The clothing's tag reads: 'Created by TonyJC, with implementation and editing by NeverLucky'
coreAttributes.name: cropped sweater
coreAttributes.description: A comfortable long-sleeve sweater that exposes the stomach.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc.her] head.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.

displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] off [npc2.namePos] sweater, revealing the chest under.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(snag)] off [npc2.namePos] sweater, revealing the chest under.

replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] sweater back down, covering [npc2.her] chest under.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] sweater back down, covering [npc2.her] chest under.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] sweater up to just below [npc.her] chin, fully exposing [npc.her] torso.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] sweater up to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] chest under.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] sweater up to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] chest under.
